caption.p: Cytotoxicity of ZnO-NPs ( a), ZnO-PEG-NPs ( b), polyethylene glycol ( c), and oseltamivir ( d) on MDCK-SIAT1 cells. * Statistically significant ( p < 0.05). ** Statistically significant ( p = 0.003). ** Statistically significant ( p = 0.0005). **** Highly statistically significant ( p = 0.0001). Error bars represent the confidence interval for the mean ( n = 3) at the 95% level
